attributes.action: GP's to send all patients for MRI scan when ruling out Migraines and Headaches
attributes.additional_details: My daughter was diagnosed with a brain tumour after 18 months of visiting the GP with migraines!!! We are the lucky ones as her tumour was operable and benign!! I had full trust in our doctor so never pushed for MRI scan until we attended A&E!! My idea is that all patients suffering with any recurring headaches should be automatically sent for a MRI scan just to check them out!!
